short_description: Say Farewell to Dark Circles and Puffiness: Are you striving to improve your life? When you're exhausted from various daily tasks, why not pamper yourself with a soothing, relaxing dark circles under eye treatment? We're assisting numerous customers in achieving excellent results with our high-quality under eye patches for dark circles and puffiness. These eye patches effectively reduce fine lines, dark circles, eye bags, and tired-looking eyes, helping you maintain a youthful appearance.

Our Advantages: Our premium 24K gold eye masks are developed by a Korean cosmetic laboratory. They contain a blend of natural ingredients, including 24K Nano Gold, Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gelidiella acerosa extract, Avocado oil, Camellia sinensis leaf extract, Vitamin C, Retinol, Vitamin E, and Rose essence. These ingredients are highly effective for eye bag remover, gold eye patches for puffy eyes, eye mask for puffiness, eye mask skincare and under eye bags treatment for women and men.

Cutting-Edge Design and Formulation: Our gold under eye mask patches are ergonomically designed to adhere perfectly to your skin. The premium ingredients are applied to the skin's surface, providing excellent moisturizing effects. These patches contain natural moisturizing factors, primarily suitable for addressing dry and peeling skin symptoms. They also enhance skin tightness, leading to reduced and diluted pores, as well as promoting skin metabolism.

Directions: Clean your face with warm water and dry it. Take a pair of collagen under eye gel pads and apply them as follows: Gently press the masks onto your skin, ensuring there is no air trapped underneath. Note that the masks might initially slide due to its essence. Hold the eye masks in place for about 1 minute to allow your skin to absorb the essence, or remove any excess. The eye masks will adhere well. Wait for around 20 minutes to allow your skin to absorb the premium ingredients.

Tips: Store the under eye masks in a cool, dry place at temperatures between 0℃/32℉ and 45℃/113℉, and shield it from direct sunlight. Extreme heat or cold can harm the product. For optimal results, we recommend using the eye patches for wrinkles daily. Placing the gel eye pads in the fridge for a short period before use can enhance the experience, but please refrain from freezing them.

Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed: From day one, our priority has been customer satisfaction. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions, and we will respond within 24 hours. If you are unsatisfied with our products, we offer a one hundred percent money-back guarantee.
